# integerValue(asTypeTruncatingIfNeeded:)

**Instance Method**

The raw value of the data cast as an integer type, with no transformations applied.

## Declaration

```swift
func integerValue<IntegerType>(asTypeTruncatingIfNeeded: IntegerType.Type) -> IntegerType where IntegerType : FixedWidthInteger
```

## Parameters

- **asTypeTruncatingIfNeeded**: The type to which to cast the underlying bytes, truncating or extending the bytes as necessary.

## Return Value

The data cast as the requested type.

## Get element data and values

- **bytes**: The data as an array of bytes.
- **logicalValue(asTypeTruncatingIfNeeded:)**: The raw value of the data cast as an integer type and bound by the [doc://com.apple.CoreHID/documentation/CoreHID/HIDElement]’s logical minimum and logical maximum values.
- **physicalValue(fromTypeTruncatingIfNeeded:as:)**: The logical value of the data, shifted and scaled by the [doc://com.apple.CoreHID/documentation/CoreHID/HIDElement]’s physical minimum, physical maximum and exponent.
- **timestamp**: The time that this data was received by the system.
